content.rendered:
learn

Individual career guidance

After your application

You have applied online for an individual career guidance interview: what is the next step?

Once you’ve applied online for an individual career guidance interview, please keep your automatic email that sums up your application number: you are done for now !

Within 10 days, we will contact you by email to schedule an appointment with one of our career guidance counsellors, and will inform you about payment terms.
